content.rendered:
We Help Apps Grow

Weewoo is a consultancy and Mobile Growth Agency that works with the teams behind the leading applications. We offer 4 key services: User Acquisition, Product Optimization, Store Optimization and M&A services.

Start Now

User Acquisition

Fuel Your Growth And Achieve Your Goals!

We’re a dedicated UA team helping you hit your KPIs and achieve unprecedented mobile growth. We launch and scale apps and games through our success-driven growth strategies. We love leveraging the most efficient paid media channels like ASA, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, Snapchat Ads or any channel that best aligns with your app or game marketing strategy goals.

We help you reach your mobile marketing campaign KPIs in the most cost-effective and innovative way to get users with low CPI. We analyze each channel and optimize your budget to acquire new users in large volumes for your application. We optimize the cost and results by carrying out controlled campaigns in real time.

Thanks to our foolproof user acquisition management services, we’ll help you design a growth marketing strategy that covers every part of your funnel. How can we achieve this? Writing compelling copy, creating standout images, running split tests, optimizing your campaigns with advanced user acquisition…

Are you looking for a user acquisition marketing agency that is results-oriented? Want to drive targeted traffic to your app or game, generate qualified leads, acquire loyal users and increase your sales while earning a positive ROI? Look no further – you’ve landed at the right place! User acquisition is an essential element of digital marketing if you want to promote your mobile products and services, but you need to work with experts to make sure you collect the right data and analyze it.

Product Optimization

Building Efficiently
At Scale

When building products, our focus is to minimize inputs and maximize outputs through a proven track record of effective decision-making. Industry expertise and untamed curiosity fuels our team’s efforts to establish solid product growth.

Our holistic approach in product development is grounded by specialists and ex-founders of gaming studios and mobile app startups with high grossing and chart topping product.

We offer expertise in the key areas that make a product achieve high ROI. Ad monetization, game design, product management, live ops, in game economy, LTV analysis and business review are amongst some of the fields we offer services.

A turn key solution to product growth has arrived and you are just one click away from it. Reach out now!

Store Optimization

Increase Your Organic Installs

App Store Optimization is the process of getting as many users as possible combining on-metadata and off-metadata.

On-Metadata refers to your app title, subtitle and description whereas Off-Metadata refers to your apps’ user installs or their app engagement.

We have a clear strategy to follow in optimizing an app

  • Research
  • Keywords Optimization
  • Report
  • Store Update

Boost your app performance. How? Planning strategies to maximize visibility and generate a large volume of organic downloads. We use tools to find the best keywords like Apptweak or Sensor Tower and we optimize your app in different languages like English, Arabic, Turkish, Chinese or Korean.

Your app will lead among all the apps on the top charts. How? Improving visibility with Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO). We adapt the icons or screenshots to what is successful in the market and be able to reach the maximum audience. We optimize apps to stand out from the crowd understanding the app market.

If you need an efficient strategy to keep optimising the organic downloads, we are your agency. Achieve optimal positioning with us.

M&A Services

Strategic
M&A Services

WEEWOO’s M&A group of experts conveys key advice to companies all over the world on their complex transactions allowing them to achieve their business expectations.

In most of the cases, selling can be tough due to a lack of expertise and analytical resources when dealing with transactions. Thanks to our advice, companies can improve this experience by following our tactical and strategic planning, which is tailored to each client’s needs.

Our company offers guidance and assistance throughout the entire process, encompassing a variety of transactions in a straightforward and secure way. This provides the guarantees that companies need to begin large-scale operations with impetus.

Allow WEEWOO to guide you through the M&A process by helping you implement the right strategy, aligned with your goals, while identifying any additional opportunities.
